entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
